org.ow2.chameleon.core.services

Class ExtensionBasedDeployer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.chameleon.core.services.AbstractDeployer
      • org.ow2.chameleon.core.services.ExtensionBasedDeployer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deployer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigDeployer

    public class ExtensionBasedDeployer
extends AbstractDeployer
    A default implementation of the deployer accepting file by extension.

      • accept

        public boolean accept(File file)
        Description copied from interface: Deployer
        Does the current deployer accept the given file. The accept method must not check file existence, as it may disable notification on file deletion.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Returns:
        true if the file is accepted by the current deployer, false otherwise
